TopicTitle: [WIP]"KONQUEST:Modular components for permanent bases" by ASET (14/05/2014)

Articles.Content: That's the coolest set of stairs I have ever seen!
I've been checking in on this mod daily for a few months now just hoping to see a download available. Damn I can't wait i've been wanting something like this for awhile now.
jimmyjack, you are not alone!

Every time, EVERY SINGLE TIME, AlexUstas shows us an update or a new planned feature of this pack (or any of his mods, really), my jaw just totally hits the floor!

The only thing is, I'm starting to worry about whether all these awesome textures and animations are going to kill my computer, lol!
Just beautiful. If this integrates well with KAO3 it will be a lovely experience to play.
if there is *one* mod I can't wait for... this is going to be the end all be all of surface base parts hands down

Now you can choose between two options: SMA w/Dockport or SMA w/Airlock

http://youtu.be/nmFaLLXvzik

if there is *one* mod I can't wait for... this is going to be the end all be all of surface base parts hands down

Amen to that. Granted, this won't be covering every situation and completely superseding the right combination of stock and other modded parts for a complete experience... but this one giant horse-pill alone will solve almost 97% of the problems I face when trying to even conceptualize any sort of colonization pod. I almost wish I had not found this work-in-progress thread, because since seeing the first sample image I cannot enjoy KSP in the same way again until I see this in action in my own simulation.

EDIT: I concur with the above statement and add to it: Great Jebediah's-Mother's-2nd-Cousin-Twice-Removed's Ghost!!!

Edited August 13, 2014 by Gaalidas
Its been a little while since we heard anything new just wanted to know if you had any updates. Not trying to be a pain just curious.
Can't believe I never saw this until today! I can't wait to try it out!
Awesome work! Any chance of a radial engine and acommpanying fuel tanks that will match the style of the pods?

Its been a little while since we heard anything new just wanted to know if you had any updates. Not trying to be a pain just curious.

In my case, I am trying to be a pain. Really, I am. I'm very painful...

Okay, so I'm not that painful, but I have been known to be in pain at times.

Just... bleh... update this thing already. eesh! The natives are getting restless and I can't keep distracting them forever.
Beware Howard Hughs syndrome.
Wow, this looks really cool. Seems like you could almost play SIMS Kerbal addition just within the bases you could build.
Will this be ORS compatible? If so, it would pretty much be the end game, end all colonization mod

I'm sure adjustments for specific mods, filterable by mod presence in the user's installation using MM's "NEEDS" system within the configs, could be established to make this stuff compatible with just about everything, much like we've all been doing with just about every other resource modification available.
Hoping to see a release soon so I can try this out!
Alexustas? Don't scare me now any new news?
If you ever release this, YOU ARE A GOD!

Alexustas? Don't scare me now any new news?

I usually try not to make posts like this nowadays, but I'm with sp1989, this thread has gone disturbingly silent. I hope all is well.
Oh KONQUEST please don't die. I'm so looking forward to this one.

I usually try not to make posts like this nowadays, but I'm with sp1989, this thread has gone disturbingly silent. I hope all is well.

It's not only disturbing... it's down right... okay, I guess the word I was going for was also disturbing. I mean literally, not just another disturbing word. I mean... okay, I give up. English (the language) sucks sometimes.

KONQUEST is definitively one of the mods i'm waiting the most. Between the design, the possibilities resulting from the modularity and all the small details considered, I'm totally respectful of the work made by alexustas

Well, alexustas has posted in the forums as recently as yesterday, so at least he seems to be fine. But as to this project? no idea.

I am wondering if he isn't being held back by the total lack of crew needs mods beyond air/water/food. Exercise, health, and any other kerbal-specific kind of mod so far seems to have died on the vine, due to Squad's total and complete lack of any useful Kerbal API beyond 'name, courage, stupidity, whee, panic, badass, alive/dead.'

I may venture onto this path myself, but cant say if I will be successful where so many others have failed.
Guys, just be patient. The mod is not dead.
